scripts.e2e:5.0: make test-e2e VERSION=5.0 OUTPUT_URL=output-50.txt 2>&1 | tee output-50.txt
scripts.e2e:5.1: make test-e2e VERSION=5.1 OUTPUT_URL=output-51.txt 2>&1 | tee output-51.txt
scripts.e2e:5.2: make test-e2e VERSION=5.2 OUTPUT_URL=output-52.txt 2>&1 | tee output-52.txt
scripts.e2e:5.3: make test-e2e VERSION=5.3 OUTPUT_URL=output-53.txt 2>&1 | tee output-53.txt
scripts.e2e:5.4: make test-e2e VERSION=5.4 OUTPUT_URL=output-54.txt 2>&1 | tee output-54.txt
scripts.e2e:latest: make test-e2e VERSION=latest OUTPUT_URL=output-latest.txt 2>&1 | tee output-latest.txt
scripts.e2e:nightly: make test-e2e VERSION=nightly OUTPUT_URL=output-nightly.txt 2>&1 | tee output-nightly.txt
scripts.e2e:release: npm run e2e:5.0 & npm run e2e:5.1 & npm run e2e:5.2 & npm run e2e:5.3 & npm run e2e:5.4 & npm run e2e:latest
scripts.local:e2e:latest: TEST_WORDPRESS_VERSION=latest bash -c "docker-compose -p latest build && docker-compose -p latest up --build"
scripts.local:e2e:nightly: TEST_WORDPRESS_VERSION=nightly bash -c "docker-compose -p nightly build && docker-compose -p nightly up --build"
